actions.prompt: Create a Job Summary in 5 sentences for following position:
actions.title: Job Summary

actions.prompt: Create a Fit Match, do not create a cover letter:
actions.title: Fit Match

actions.prompt: think long, be critical, and provide a Fit Match with no cover letter:
actions.title: Critical Fit Match

actions.prompt: if the job summary contains the title of a company , create a brief 5 sentence of the company:
actions.title: Company Summary

globalSettings.gptTitleMatch: ChatGPT - Keith Fry's Job Match and Cover Letter Coach
